hanzi-su-wiki:
帥

Значения

Вести за собой, возглавлять

Мнемоника

Кирпичное (слева) здание с матерчатым 巾 барабаном вместо флага — правительственное учреждение или учебное заведение, как правило, военизированное.

Варианты

帅

heisig_chinese_memo: The commander is a military maestro who never throws in the towel.
koohiiStory1: The COMMANDER is a military MAESTRO who never throws in the TOWEL.
koohiiStory2: The greatest of them all; Commander James Bond, 007. Here he is the maestro of undressing women, removing the towel from some bond girl. Of course the towel symbolises her last vestige of resistance.
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: There's a drop of bear on this towel. A true commander can notice little things like this.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine a commander carefully looking over everything. They not only notice a drop of something on a towel, but they're able to identify that the drop is a small piece of liquid bear.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You watch the commander in all his glory... going back and forth on a swing (すい).
Ru_Notes: Не путать: 師 (もろもろ、シ учитель).

chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: A true commander holds up his sword and never throws in the towel!
humanum_full_description_en:
Oracle from the two " claws " from "丨", like a stick in one hand pulling the other hand, the original meaning is traction, extension has the meaning of leading. Jin Wenjia from the " scarf " side. One said that "丨" is the pictogram of a towel, like two hands holding a towel, followed by a " scarf " to strengthen the meaning of wearing a towel. The original meaning is wearing a towel (Gao Hongjin, Ji Xusheng).

The oracle bone inscriptions are used as the names of the people, the inscriptions on the inscriptions on the bones and bones indicate the leadership, but also to follow and imitate. The bell: "Don't dare to be handsome and (ancestor) test Bing Mingde." ) The King's Order". It means to imitate the virtues of the ancestors and follow the orders of the king.

" Handsome " is also used as "帨", "Shuowen": "Handsome, wear a towel. Congjin, 𠂤. Shuai, handsome or Congdui. Youyin tax." See "帨".
humanum_short_description_en: Oracle starts from two " claws " from "丨", like a stick in one hand and the other hand. The original meaning is traction, and extension means leading. Jin Wenjia from the " scarf " side. One said that the original meaning is wearing towel (Gao Hongjin, Ji Xusheng).
humanum_full_description:
甲骨文從二「爪」從「丨」，象一手持杖牽引另一手之形，本義是牽引，引伸有率領之意。金文加從「巾」旁。一說「丨」為巾的象形，象兩手持巾，後加「巾」旁以強化佩巾之義，本義是佩巾(高鴻縉、季旭昇)。

　　甲骨文用作人名，金文表示率領，又表示遵循、效法，𤼈鐘：「𤼈不敢弗帥且(祖)考秉明德」，師虎簋：「今余隹(惟)帥井(刑)先王令」。表示效法先祖的德行，遵循先王的命令。

　　「帥」亦作「帨」，《說文》：「帥，佩巾也。從巾、𠂤。帨，帥或從兌。又音稅。」參見「帨」。
humanum_short_description: 甲骨文從二「爪」從「丨」，象一手持杖牽引另一手之形，本義是牽引，引伸有率領之意。金文加從「巾」旁。一說本義是佩巾(高鴻縉、季旭昇)。

甲骨文從二「 爪 」從「 丨 」，象一手持杖牽引另一手之形，本義是牽引，引伸有率領之意。金文加從「 巾 」旁。一說「 丨 」為巾的象形，象兩手持巾，後加「 巾 」旁以強化佩巾之義，本義是佩巾(高鴻縉、季旭昇)。 甲骨文用作人名，金文表示率領，又表示遵循、效法，𤼈鐘：「𤼈不敢弗帥且(祖)考秉明德」，師虎簋：「今余隹(惟)帥井(刑)先王令」。表示效法先祖的德行，遵循先王的命令。 「 帥 」亦作「 帨 」，《說文》：「帥，佩巾也。從巾、𠂤。帨，帥或從兌。又音稅。」參見「 帨 」。
Oracle from the two " claws" from " 丨", like a stick in one hand pulling the other hand, the original meaning is traction, extension has the meaning of leading. Jin Wenjia from the " scarf" side. One said that " 丨" is the pictogram of a towel, like two hands holding a towel, followed by a " scarf" to strengthen the meaning of wearing a towel. The original meaning is wearing a towel (Gao Hongjin, Ji Xusheng). The oracle bone inscriptions are used as the names of the people, the inscriptions on the inscriptions on the bones and bones indicate the leadership, but also to follow and imitate. The bell: "Don't dare to be handsome and (ancestor) test Bing Mingde." ) The King's Order". It means to imitate the virtues of the ancestors and follow the orders of the king. " Handsome" is also used as " 帨", "Shuowen": "Handsome, wear a towel. Congjin, 𠂤. Shuai, handsome or Congdui. Youyin tax." See " 帨".

帥字的基本解释

帥
shuài
见“帅”。

帥字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shuài］
［《廣韻》所類切，去至，生。］
［《廣韻》所律切，入質，生。］
“帅1”的繁体字。
(1)统率；率领。
(2)引导；带头。
(3)表率，楷模。
(4)遵循。
(5)急遽。参见“帥然”、“帥爾”。
(6)军队中主将、统帅。
(7)泛指官长。
(8)起主导作用的人或事物。
(9)宋时经略安抚司简称“帥”或“帥司”。
(10)谓镇守和掌管一方的军事和民政。宋元时设安抚使任之。此职常由知州、知府兼任。
(11)美，漂亮。
(12)姓。明代有帅机。著有《帅惟审先生集》。

帥字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【巾字部】　帥； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页331第11
〔古文〕䢦【唐韻】所律切【集韻】【正韻】朔律切，?音蟀。【易·師卦】長子帥師。【左傳·襄十年】牽帥老夫，以至于此。　又循也。【禮·王制】命鄉?不帥敎者以告。【註】帥，循也。　又遵也。【前漢·循吏傳】蕭曹以寬厚淸靜，爲天下帥。【註】帥，遵也。　又聚也。【揚雄·甘泉賦】帥尒隂閉，霅然陽開。【註】晉灼曰：帥，聚也。　又【說文】佩巾也。【廣雅】巾也。　又【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?所類切，率去聲。【廣韻】將帥也。【正韻】主也，率也，統也，領也。【周禮·夏官】二千五百人爲師，師帥皆中大夫。五百人爲旅，旅帥皆下大夫。【左傳·宣十二年】命爲軍帥。【疏】軍帥，軍之主帥。【前漢·黃霸傳】置父老師帥。　又姓。【廣韻】本姓師，晉景帝諱，改爲帥氏。晉尚書郞帥昺。　又【五音集韻】舒芮切，音稅。同帨。亦佩巾也。

考證：〔【揚雄·甘泉賦】帥尒隂閉，霅然陽關。〕　謹照原文關改開。

Handsome
Basic explanation of words
Handsome
shuài
See "handsome".
Handsome
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［shuài］
["Guangyun" class cut, go to, and live. ]
["Guangyun" the law cuts, enters the quality, and is born. ]
Traditional characters for "帅1".
(1) Command; lead.
(2) Guide; take the lead.
(3) To set an example and model.
(4) Follow.
(5) Anxious. See "shuairan", "shuaier".
(6) The general and commander-in-chief of the army.
(7) Refers to the chief in general.
(8) The person or thing that plays a leading role.
(9) Song Shi Jingluo Fusi is abbreviated as "shuai" or "shuaisi".
(10) It means to guard and control the military and civil affairs of one party. In the Song and Yuan dynasties, he was appointed to appease him. This post is often held concurrently by the prefects and prefects.
(11) Beautiful and beautiful.
(12) Last name. There were handsome opportunities in the Ming Dynasty. Author of "Mr. Shuai Weishen Collection".

Radicals: 丶, 巾  (drop, towel, bear)
Meaning Mnemonic
There's a drop of bear on this towel. A true commander can notice little things like this.
Imagine a commander carefully looking over everything. They not only notice a drop of something on a towel, but they're able to identify that the drop is a small piece of liquid bear.
Reading Mnemonic
You watch the commander in all his glory... going back and forth on a swing (すい).
"Weeee!" says the commander.
